entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
